headline: Leadership Shake-Up at Coty Could Be A Game Changer For Coty (COTY)
summary: Coty Inc. has appointed former Procter & Gamble executive Markus Strobel as Interim Chief Executive Officer and Executive Chairman, effective January 1, 2026, succeeding outgoing CEO Sue Nabi and long-time Executive Chairman Peter Harf. This leadership transition brings to Coty a leader credited with reshaping global skin and personal care portfolios and modernizing beauty operations across major regions, potentially influencing how the company manages innovation, brand building, and...
